name: Fox Girls Are Better
summary:
今天就来订购一个乖巧可爱的猫（X）娘吧！洗衣做饭样样精通！

Noble is a lonely YouTuber obsessed with Anime. One day, he attempts to order a cat girl maid online, but ends up with a crazy fox girl instead. 

ART: Curryless CHARACTER: Lost Pause STORY: Merryweather
info:
• 中文名: 狐娘赛高
  • 别名: 狐娘賽高
  • 连载杂志: LINE WEBTOON
  • 作者: Merryweather
  • 作画: Curryless
  • 连载开始: 2018-07-09
